Package core.modAPI

Interface CreatureAttribute<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the new "field" for the Creature class
    public interface CreatureAttribute<T>
    Implementing this interface serves the same purpose as adding a field to the Creature class. I created this interface so that nobody would have to modify any core source code. This way, installing mods will never cause horrible conflicts.
    Author:
    clay

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      CreatureAttribute<T> fromString​(java.lang.String s)

    • Method Detail

      • init

        void init​(Board b,
          Creature c)
        Called when the creature c is created
        Parameters:
        b - the board that the creature c lives on
        c - the creature whose attribute you're initializing

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        What is this attribute called?
        Returns:
        the name of this attribute (not neccessarily this class' name)

      • getValue

        T getValue()
        What is the current value of this attribute?
        Returns:
        the value of this attribute

      • setValue

        void setValue​(T v)
        Set the value of this attribute
        Parameters:
        v -

      • update

        void update​(double lastUpdateTime,
            double updateTime,
            Creature c,
            Board b)
        Called once per tic. This is the function where you want to update this
        Parameters:
        lastUpdateTime - the last time the simulation updated
        updateTime - the time of this current update
        c - the creature that this attribute belongs to
        b - the board that the creature c lives on

      • initFromParents

        void initFromParents​(java.util.ArrayList<CreatureAttribute> parentAttributes,
                     Board board)
        Called once per tic. This is the function where you want to update the value of this attribute (if you actually want to do that)
        Parameters:
        parentAttributes - a list of the attributes (of this implementation) that belong to the parents. To be clear, every single element of this list is an instance of this same implementation
        board - the board that the parents (and soon to be child) live on

      • makeString

        java.lang.String makeString()
        This function is used to write the creature that this attribute object belongs to to file to save it from permanent deletion.
        Returns:
        A string containing all of the information needed to reconstruct this attribute for this creature.

      • fromString

        CreatureAttribute<T> fromString​(java.lang.String s)
        This method is used to revive creatures essentially from cryosleep
        Parameters:
        s - a string previously returned from toString()
        Returns:
        the attribute revived from the string representation s
